thread.title: New York,NewYork
thread.title_full: New York,NewYork - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rona662015
title: New York,NewYork
text:
My daughter and I recently stayed at the W New York for my 50th Birthday. The hotel was well maintained and staff were very helpful, especially the Concierge team. We were asked on arrival if we would like to upgrade our room at a cost of $20 per night but declined the offer as we had not seen our allocated room, however if I returned to this hotel, I would definitely upgrade as the room was VERY small ( I know rooms are generally small but this was tiny). Housekeeping was first class (don't know how they managed to manoeuvre a vacuum round the bed, it must be a military operation for them).
Room Tip: Ask to see the size of rooms available for your budget See more room tips
